description: Returns a list of successful and failed retrievals for the OpenSearch Serverless indexes. For more information, see Viewing data lifecycle policies.

parameters.name: resourceIdentifiers
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of policy types and resource names. (dict) --- The unique identifiers of policy types and resource names. type (string) --- The type of lifecycle policy. resource (string) --- The name of the OpenSearch Serverless ilndex resource.

nested_items.name: effectiveLifecyclePolicyDetails
nested_items.description: A list of lifecycle policies applied to the OpenSearch Serverless indexes.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The name of the OpenSearch Serverless index resource.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of OpenSearch Serverless resource. Currently, the only supported resource is index.

nested_items.name: retentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The minimum number of index retention in days or hours. This is an optional parameter that will return only if it's set.

nested_items.name: noMinRetentionPeriod
nested_items.description: The minimum number of index retention days set. That is an optional param that will return as true if the minimum number of days or hours is not set to a index resource.

nested_items.name: effectiveLifecyclePolicyErrorDetails
nested_items.description: A list of resources for which retrieval failed.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The name of OpenSearch Serverless index resource.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A description of the error. For example, The specified Index resource is not found.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the request.
